title: A Mystery Gift from Riot Games?
body:
I was just wondering why Riot just sent me a mystery gift.
I mean I'm not complaining, I'm just wondering why.
I remember months back everyone received one for being an honorable player or whatever and I got that one too back in January, but no one I talk to got one today so I'm just wondering why I did. 
Was there another event giveaway? I've gotten a few honors lately so is it possible that I got one from that?
Idk.

replies.body: I think at some point during the bilgewater event if you gifted enough mystery skins you would get 1 for free...

Good people randomly get them now


or it was 1 mystery gift for every 6 during the event
Oh ok makes sense I do give a lot of mystery gifts.
